left.heading: What Is Keyword Overview?
left.paragraph:
Keyword Overview is a keyword checker that instantly reveals the most important SEO and marketing metrics for any term. Just enter a word or phrase. The tool will dig deep into Semrush’s massive database to provide the keyword’s search volume, keyword difficulty, intent, competition level, CPC, 12-month trend, number of results, and more.

These insights help you assess how difficult it will be to rank for your chosen keyword and fine-tune your SEO strategy with confidence.

Keyword Overview is a free, hassle-free alternative to Google Keyword Planner.

right.heading: Why Use a Keyword Checker?
right.paragraph:
You should use a keyword checker to gain in-depth insights into each keyword's difficulty, search volume, and competition, allowing you to make data-driven marketing decisions.

By identifying which search terms are realistic to target, you can prioritize the most promising opportunities, drive more organic traffic, and ultimately get better results from your SEO and marketing efforts.

features.title: Free & easy to use
features.description: Our keyword checker is free and simple for anyone to use.

features.title: All-in-one SEO keyword checker
features.description: Provides a complete keyword overview, including difficulty scores, competition metrics, search intent, and search volume trends.

features.title: Website keyword checker
features.description: Analyze any website’s keywords to gauge keyword difficulty, competition, and targeting for an entire site.

features.title: Keyword competition checker
features.description: Evaluate how hard it is to outrank competitors by assessing the SEO competition for your target keywords.

features.title: Bulk keywords
features.description: Check keyword insights for multiple keywords at once to compare and prioritize the best SEO opportunities.

features.title: Personalized insights
features.description: Keyword Overview leverages AI and machine learning to provide estimates and data for your specific website.

features.title: Local keywords
features.description: Evaluate the local demand for your target keyword in any specific city or region.

features.title: Real SERP analysis
features.description: Benchmark your SEO competition using the actual Google search results pages, complete with SERP features.

steps.text: Enter your target keyword into the text field.
View the keyword overview results, including the keyword difficulty score, search volume, competitive density, and related keyword insights.

metrics.title: Search volume
metrics.description: The average number of monthly searches over the past 12 months.

metrics.title: Keyword difficulty
metrics.description: A score that estimates how hard it will be to rank in the top 10 for this keyword.

metrics.title: Global search volume
metrics.description: The total number of average monthly searches globally across all databases.

metrics.title: Search intent
metrics.description: The general purpose of or reason behind a search.

metrics.title: Search trend
metrics.description: The interest of searchers in an analyzed keyword over the last 12 months.

metrics.title: CPC
metrics.description: The average price advertisers pay for a user’s click for the keyword in Google Ads.

metrics.title: Competitive density
metrics.description: The level of competition between advertisers bidding on an analyzed keyword within their PPC campaigns.

metrics.title: Keyword ideas
metrics.description: Lists of related keywords, including keyword variations, questions, and keyword clusters.

metrics.title: SERP analysis
metrics.description: An analysis of the search results for query, including SERP features, ranking URLs, and supporting data on the ranking URLs, such as referring domains and search traffic.

faqs.question: Is Keyword Overview free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Keyword Overview is completely free for anyone to use.

faqs.question: Can I see both organic and paid data for keywords?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can view both organic and paid keyword metrics.

faqs.question: How can I use the domain-based feature?
faqs.answer: You can enter a domain to analyze its keyword metrics across the site.

faqs.question: How does the Personal Keyword Difficulty checker work?
faqs.answer: It estimates how hard it will be to rank for a specific keyword on your website.

faqs.question: Can I filter the keyword data based on location and device?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can filter data by country, city, and device type.

faqs.question: How is the Keyword Difficulty score calculated?
faqs.answer: The score is calculated using search volume, competition, and other SEO factors.
